00034 #ifndef _XED_PORTABILITY_H_
00035 # define _XED_PORTABILITY_H_
00036 # include "xed-types.h"

00038 #define XED_STATIC_CAST(x,y) ((x) (y))
00039 #define XED_REINTERPRET_CAST(x,y) ((x) (y))

00053 #if defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00054 # if defined(_WIN32) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00055 #   if _MSC_VER >= 1400
00056 #     define XED_MSVC8_OR_LATER 1
00057 #   endif
00058 # endif
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 /* recognize VC98 */
00062 #if !defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00063 # if defined(_WIN32) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00064 #   if _MSC_VER == 1200
00065 #     define XED_MSVC6 1
00066 #   endif
00067 # endif
00068 # if defined(_WIN32) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00069 #   if _MSC_VER == 1310
00070 #     define XED_MSVC7 1
00071 #   endif
00072 # endif
00073 # if defined(_WIN32) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00074 #   if _MSC_VER >= 1400
00075 #     define XED_MSVC8_OR_LATER 1
00076 #   endif
00077 #   if _MSC_VER == 1400
00078 #     define XED_MSVC8 1
00079 #   endif
00080 #   if _MSC_VER == 1500
00081 #     define XED_MSVC9 1
00082 #   endif
00083 #   if _MSC_VER >= 1500
00084 #     define XED_MSVC9_OR_LATER 1
00085 #   endif
00086 #   if _MSC_VER == 1600
00087 #     define XED_MSVC10 1
00088 #   endif
00089 #   if _MSC_VER >= 1600
00090 #     define XED_MSVC10_OR_LATER 1
00091 #   endif
00092 # endif
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 /* I've had compatibilty problems here so I'm using a trivial indirection */
00096 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00097 #  if defined(__CYGWIN__)
00098       /* cygwin's gcc 3.4.4 on windows  complains */
00099 #    define XED_FMT_X "%lx"
00100 #    define XED_FMT_08X "%08lx"
00101 #    define XED_FMT_D "%ld"
00102 #    define XED_FMT_U "%lu"
00103 #    define XED_FMT_9U "%9lu"
00104 #  else
00105 #    define XED_FMT_X "%x"
00106 #    define XED_FMT_08X "%08x"
00107 #    define XED_FMT_D "%d"
00108 #    define XED_FMT_U "%u"
00109 #    define XED_FMT_9U "%9u"
00110 #  endif
00111 #else
00112 #  define XED_FMT_X "%x"
00113 #  define XED_FMT_08X "%08x"
00114 #  define XED_FMT_D "%d"
00115 #  define XED_FMT_U "%u"
00116 #  define XED_FMT_9U "%9u"
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #if defined(__GNUC__) && defined(__LP64__) && !defined(__APPLE__)
00120 # define XED_FMT_LX "%lx"
00121 # define XED_FMT_LU "%lu"
00122 # define XED_FMT_LU12 "%12lu"
00123 # define XED_FMT_LD "%ld"
00124 # define XED_FMT_LX16 "%016lx"
00125 # define XED_FMT_SIZET "%lu"
00126 #else
00127 # define XED_FMT_LX "%llx"
00128 # define XED_FMT_LU "%llu"
00129 # define XED_FMT_LU12 "%12llu"
00130 # define XED_FMT_LD "%lld"
00131 # define XED_FMT_LX16 "%016llx"
00132 # define XED_FMT_SIZET "%llu"
00133 #endif
00134 
00135 #if defined(__LP64__) || defined (_M_X64) 
00136 # define XED_64B 1
00137 #endif
00138 
00139 #if defined(_M_IA64)
00140 # define XED_IPF
00141 # define XED_FMT_SIZET "%lu"
00142 #endif

00144 #if defined(__GNUC__)    
00145      /* gcc4.2.x has a bug with c99/gnu99 inlining */
00146 #  if __GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ == 2
00147 #    define XED_INLINE inline
00148 #  else
00149 #    if __GNUC__ == 2
00150 #       define XED_INLINE 
00151 #    else 
00152 #       define XED_INLINE inline
00153 #    endif
00154 # endif
00155 # define XED_NORETURN __attribute__ ((noreturn))
00156 # if __GNUC__ == 2
00157 #   define XED_NOINLINE 
00158 # else
00159 #   define XED_NOINLINE __attribute__ ((noinline))
00160 # endif
00161 #else
00162 # define XED_INLINE __inline
00163 # if defined(XED_MSVC6)
00164 #   define XED_NOINLINE 
00165 # else
00166 #   define XED_NOINLINE __declspec(noinline)
00167 # endif
00168 # define XED_NORETURN __declspec(noreturn)
00169 #endif

00172 
00173 #define XED_MAX(a, b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a):(b))
00174 #define XED_MIN(a, b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a):(b))
